titleStmt.title: A treatise conteining two parts 1 An exhortation to true loue, loyaltie, and fidelitie to her Maiestie. 2 A treatise against treasons, rebellions, and such disloyalties. Written by Michael Renniger.
titleStmt.author: Renniger, Michael, 1530-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree by Thomas Dawson, and are there to be sold,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; leaves U,U2 mutilated, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the three Cranes in the Vintree
